PERSONA:
meet ryan thompson, a 57-year-old married man living in the metropolitan area of charlotte, north carolina. born and raised in the united states, ryan identifies as white non-hispanic and holds u.s. citizenship. he has a degree in business administration from the university of north carolina at charlotte and some postgraduate coursework from a local university. ryan works as an operations manager at a mid-sized manufacturing firm in the automotive sector, earning a salary of $92,500 per year. 

ryan is married to his high school sweetheart, rachel, who works part-time as a librarian at a local elementary school. they have two children: a 24-year-old daughter who recently graduated from college and is working as a marketing specialist, and a 20-year-old son who is currently a sophomore in college. the family lives in a two-story, single-family home in the suburb of matthews, which they purchased for $270,000 in 2005.

ryan is a self-described conservative who leans towards the republican party, but tends to identify as an independent. he believes in personal responsibility and limited government intervention in economic matters. ryan's economic concerns center around tax policies, healthcare costs, and education. he is particularly worried about the national debt and its potential impact on his children's future. despite his conservative leanings, ryan supports policies that promote environmental protection and public education.

in his free time, ryan enjoys playing golf, watching carolina panthers games, and spending time with his family. he attends a local non-denominational church with his family on major holidays, identifying as "nothing in particular" when it comes to his religious affiliation. ryan seldom attends religious services but appreciates the community and charitable aspects of the church.

as an avid internet user, ryan frequently checks news websites, emails, and social media several times a day. however, he is not active in volunteering for local causes, citing time constraints due to his work schedule. ryan is absolutely certain that he is registered to vote at his current address and exercises his right to vote in local and national elections.
